definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The amount of solar energy hitting its high-latitude location is now roughly the same as it was when it shut down.
sentences.chinese: 如今到達高緯度地區的太陽能與其關閉時的大致相當。

sentences.english: In the higher latitudes, these patterns may be connected to the Arctic Oscillation.
sentences.chinese: 在高緯度地區，這種氣候模式可能與北極濤動有關。

sentences.english: High-latitude sky watchers should be alert for auroras.
sentences.chinese: 位於高緯度的天空觀察者應該小心極光。

sentences.english: The probe was studying the vast region of sand dunes in the high northern latitudes on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 此次的探測地選在火星北部高緯度的大片高崗地區。

sentences.english: Upper latitudes are warming faster than mid-latitudes, and the pollen season is lengthening in proportion.
sentences.chinese: 高緯度比中緯度升溫更快，花粉季也成比例增長。

sentences.english: Upper latitudes are warming faster than mid-latitudes, and the pollen season is lengthening in proportion.
sentences.chinese: 高緯度比中緯度升溫更快，花粉季也成比例增長。

sentences.english: The difference may be associated with the variability of zonal wind in the middle and high latitudes.
sentences.chinese: 這種差異可能跟中高緯度緯向西風的自身變化有關。

sentences.english: The anomaly of sea-ice in this area produced anomaly of circulation in middle -high latitude .
sentences.chinese: 哈得孫灣海冰也對中高緯度環流有明顯的影響。

definition: Europa (moon of Jupiter), aka Jupiter II

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4
